verses.kjv: A soft answer turneth away wrath: but grievous words stir up anger.
verses.ct: A gentle response defuses rage, but harsh words fuel anger.

verses.kjv: The tongue of the wise useth knowledge aright: but the mouth of fools poureth out foolishness.
verses.ct: Wise people use knowledge well when they speak, but the mouths of fools pour out nonsense.

verses.kjv: The eyes of the LORD are in every place, beholding the evil and the good.
verses.ct: The LORD's eyes are everywhere, watching both the wicked and the good.

verses.kjv: A wholesome tongue is a tree of life: but perverseness therein is a breach in the spirit.
verses.ct: A healing tongue is a tree of life, but a twisted tongue crushes the spirit.

verses.kjv: A fool despiseth his father’s instruction: but he that regardeth reproof is prudent.
verses.ct: Only a fool rejects his father's correction, but someone who accepts rebuke shows good sense.

verses.kjv: In the house of the righteous is much treasure: but in the revenues of the wicked is trouble.
verses.ct: The home of the righteous holds great wealth, but the income of the wicked brings trouble.

verses.kjv: The lips of the wise disperse knowledge: but the heart of the foolish doeth not so.
verses.ct: The lips of wise people spread knowledge, but the hearts of fools do not.

verses.kjv: The sacrifice of the wicked is an abomination to the LORD: but the prayer of the upright is his delight.
verses.ct: The LORD despises the sacrifices of wicked people, but the prayers of those who live right are his delight.

verses.kjv: The way of the wicked is an abomination unto the LORD: but he loveth him that followeth after righteousness.
verses.ct: The LORD despises the path of the wicked, but he loves those who pursue righteousness.

verses.kjv: Correction is grievous unto him that forsaketh the way: and he that hateth reproof shall die.
verses.ct: Severe discipline awaits anyone who abandons the right path, and whoever refuses correction will die.

verses.kjv: Hell and destruction are before the LORD: how much more then the hearts of the children of men?
verses.ct: Even death and destruction lie open before the LORD — how much more the hearts of human beings?

verses.kjv: A scorner loveth not one that reproveth him: neither will he go unto the wise.
verses.ct: A mocker doesn't like being corrected, so he won't go to wise people for guidance.

verses.kjv: A merry heart maketh a cheerful countenance: but by sorrow of the heart the spirit is broken.
verses.ct: A joyful heart shows on your face, but heartache crushes the spirit.

verses.kjv: The heart of him that hath understanding seeketh knowledge: but the mouth of fools feedeth on foolishness.
verses.ct: An understanding mind searches for knowledge, but the mouths of fools consume foolishness.

verses.kjv: All the days of the afflicted are evil: but he that is of a merry heart hath a continual feast.
verses.ct: Every day is miserable for someone who is suffering, but a cheerful heart enjoys a never-ending celebration.

verses.kjv: Better is little with the fear of the LORD than great treasure and trouble therewith.
verses.ct: It's better to have little with wholehearted dedication to the LORD than to have great wealth along with turmoil.

verses.kjv: Better is a dinner of herbs where love is, than a stalled ox and hatred therewith.
verses.ct: A simple meal of vegetables shared with love is better than a fattened steak served with hatred.

verses.kjv: A wrathful man stirreth up strife: but he that is slow to anger appeaseth strife.
verses.ct: A hot-tempered person stirs up conflict, but someone who is patient calms disputes.

verses.kjv: The way of the slothful man is as an hedge of thorns: but the way of the righteous is made plain.
verses.ct: The path of a lazy person is like a wall of thorns, but the road of the righteous is a clear highway.

verses.kjv: A wise son maketh a glad father: but a foolish man despiseth his mother.
verses.ct: A wise son brings joy to his father, but a foolish person shows contempt for his mother.

verses.kjv: Folly is joy to him that is destitute of wisdom: but a man of understanding walketh uprightly.
verses.ct: Foolishness delights someone who lacks sense, but a person with understanding stays on a straight course.

verses.kjv: Without counsel purposes are disappointed: but in the multitude of counsellors they are established.
verses.ct: Plans fall apart without advice, but with many advisors they succeed.

verses.kjv: A man hath joy by the answer of his mouth: and a word spoken in due season, how good is it!
verses.ct: People find satisfaction in giving a good reply — and how wonderful is the right word at the right time!

verses.kjv: The way of life is above to the wise, that he may depart from hell beneath.
verses.ct: The path of life leads upward for the wise, keeping them away from the grave below.

verses.kjv: The LORD will destroy the house of the proud: but he will establish the border of the widow.
verses.ct: The LORD tears down the house of the arrogant, but he protects the property of the widow.

verses.kjv: The thoughts of the wicked are an abomination to the LORD: but the words of the pure are pleasant words.
verses.ct: The LORD despises wicked schemes, but gracious words are pure in his sight.

verses.kjv: He that is greedy of gain troubleth his own house; but he that hateth gifts shall live.
verses.ct: A greedy person brings ruin on his own family, but whoever refuses bribes will live.

verses.kjv: The heart of the righteous studieth to answer: but the mouth of the wicked poureth out evil things.
verses.ct: A righteous person thinks carefully before answering, but the mouth of the wicked spews out harmful things.

verses.kjv: The LORD is far from the wicked: but he heareth the prayer of the righteous.
verses.ct: The LORD keeps his distance from the wicked, but he listens to the prayers of the righteous.

verses.kjv: The light of the eyes rejoiceth the heart: and a good report maketh the bones fat.
verses.ct: A bright smile brings joy to the heart, and good news refreshes the whole body.

verses.kjv: The ear that heareth the reproof of life abideth among the wise.
verses.ct: Someone who listens to life-giving correction will be at home among the wise.

verses.kjv: He that refuseth instruction despiseth his own soul: but he that heareth reproof getteth understanding.
verses.ct: Whoever rejects discipline shows contempt for his own soul, but whoever accepts correction gains understanding.

verses.kjv: The fear of the LORD is the instruction of wisdom; and before honour is humility.
verses.ct: Wholehearted dedication to the LORD teaches wisdom, and humility comes before honor.
